curam.util.resources
Interface EnvironmentConstants.Workflow

Enclosing interface:
EnvironmentConstants
public static interface EnvironmentConstants.Workflow

These settings configure the properties which relate to the Workflow Environment.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String kWorkflowDisableAuditWDOValuesHistoryAfterActivity
          When specified to true, this flag will ensure that no WDO values history audit information will be written after an activity is executed.
static java.lang.String kWorkflowDisableAuditWDOValuesHistoryBeforeActivity
          When specified to true, this flag will ensure that no WDO values history audit information will be written before an activity is executed.
static java.lang.String kWorkflowDisableAuditWDOValuesHistoryTransitionEvaluation
          When specified to true, this flag will ensure that no WDO values history audit information will be written before the transitions from an activity are evaluated.
 

Field Detail

kWorkflowDisableAuditWDOValuesHistoryBeforeActivity

static final java.lang.String kWorkflowDisableAuditWDOValuesHistoryBeforeActivity
When specified to true, this flag will ensure that no WDO values history audit information will be written before an activity is executed. Property name : curam.workflow.disable.audit.wdovalueshistory.before.activity

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kWorkflowDisableAuditWDOValuesHistoryAfterActivity

static final java.lang.String kWorkflowDisableAuditWDOValuesHistoryAfterActivity
When specified to true, this flag will ensure that no WDO values history audit information will be written after an activity is executed. Property name : curam.workflow.disable.audit.wdovalueshistory.after.activity

See Also:
Constant Field Values

kWorkflowDisableAuditWDOValuesHistoryTransitionEvaluation

static final java.lang.String kWorkflowDisableAuditWDOValuesHistoryTransitionEvaluation
When specified to true, this flag will ensure that no WDO values history audit information will be written before the transitions from an activity are evaluated. Property name : curam.workflow.disable.audit.wdovalueshistory.transition.evaluation
